steps.description: Talk to Billibub Cogspinner. Buy a Bronze Tube. This is a limited supply item. Skip this step if Billibub Cogspinner doesn't have one
Talk to Duthorian Rall and accept The Tome of Valor
Talk to Felicia Gump. Buy Stormwind Seasoning Herbs
Go into The Slaughtered Lamb. Go downstairs
Talk to Ursula Deline and train your class spells
Talk to Spackle Thornberry. Buy Grimoires for your Succubus which you will have in a second. If you have extra gold also buy them for your Voidwalker
Talk to Gakin the Darkbinder, turn in Heartswood, and accept The Binding
Travel to the bottom of The Slaughtered Lamb. Use the Heartswood Core to call forth a Summoned Succubus
Kill the Summoned Succubus
Talk to Gakin the Darkbinder and turn in The Binding

tips.text: You may now use either the Succubus or Voidwalker as your pet. The Succubus deals significant damage whereas the Voidwalker provides more survivability

steps.description: Talk to Collin Mauren, turn in A Scroll from Mauren, and accept Devils in Westfall
Talk to Innkeeper Allison. Set your Hearthstone to Stormwind City
Talk to Kyra Boucher. Buy a Rune of Teleportation from her
Talk to Dungar Longdrink and fly to Westfall
Talk to Lars and accept Wolves at Our Heels.

tips.text: Do NOT accept the quest Sven's Revenge from Sven Yorgen

steps.description: Travel to Darkshire
Talk to Madame Eva and accept The Legend of Stalvan and The Totem of Infliction
Talk to Innkeeper Trelayne. Set your Hearthstone to Duskwood
Talk to Chef Grual and turn in Seasoned Wolf Kabobs.

tips.text: You need 50 skill in cooking to accept this quest

steps.description: Talk to Commander Althea Ebonlocke and accept The Night Watch
Talk to Clerk Daltry, turn in The Legend of Stalvan, and accept The Legend of Stalvan
Talk to Elaine Carevin and accept Raven Hill, The Hermit, and Deliveries to Sven

tips.text: If you can't pick up Deliveries to Sven you need to abandon Sven's Revenge from your quest log

steps.description: Talk to Felicia Maline. Get the Duskwood Flight Path
Talk to Herble Baubbletump. Buy a Bronze Tube. This is a limited supply item. Skip this step if Herble Baubbletump doesn't have one
Talk to Viktori Prism'Antras, accept Look To The Stars, and turn in Look To The Stars
Talk to Viktori Prism'Antras and accept Look To The Stars
Talk to Blind Mary, turn in Look To The Stars, and accept Look To The Stars
Kill Skeletal Warriors and Skeletal Mages

tips.text: Skeletal Warriors apply Hamstring
Skeletal Mages cast Frostbolt and also snare with Frost Armor

steps.description: Kill the Insane Ghoul. Loot him for Mary's Looking Glass.

tips.text: The Insane Ghoul may be inside of the chapel or walking around outside

steps.description: Travel towards Jitters in western Duskwood
Talk to Jitters, turn in Raven Hill, and accept Jitters' Growling Gut
Talk to Bliztik upstairs. Buy as many Healing Potions that are available. This is a limited supply item. Skip this step if Bliztik doesn't have any
Talk to Abercrombie and turn in The Hermit
Kill Starving Dire Wolves and Rabid Dire Wolves
Kill Starving Dire Wolves and Rabid Dire Wolves. Loot them for their Lean Wolf Flanks
Talk to Sven Yorgen, turn in Deliveries to Sven, and accept Sven's Revenge
Talk to Lars and turn in Wolves at Our Heels
Kill Pygmy Venom Web Spiders and Venom Web Spiders. Loot them for a Small Venom Sac and their Gooey Spider Legs.

tips.text: You need a Small Venom Sac to make an Anti-Venom later to remove the Touch of Zanzil debuff later. Save the Gooey Spider Legs for later. If you have a Paladin or Druid friend you can skip this step and ask them to remove it for you later

steps.description: Travel to Westfall
Kill Dust Devils. Loot them for their Debris.

tips.text: Dust Devils can spawn throughout all of Westfall. Their spawn locations are marked on the map
Cast Eagle Eye to try and find them

steps.description: Talk to Agent Kearnen and turn in Mathias and the Defias and accept Klaven's Tower. You MUST do this quest for your Poisons

tips.text: You MUST do this quest for your Poisons. PAY ATTENTION TO THE UPCOMING SECTION. Press Escape, then go into Options Controls. Check Enable Interact Key and bind the Interact with Target option to a key. Additionally, it's recommended you enable Enemy Nameplates (Default Key: V) as it allows you to see enemies behind some of the corners inside the tower

steps.description: Pick Pocket the Malformed Defias Drone. Loot it for the Defias Tower Key.

tips.text: You must be in Stealth to use Pick Pocket
The Malformed Defias Drone spawns at the entrance to the tower, then patrols around the outside of it
Be careful as he deals a LOT of damage. If your Stealth breaks, quickly use Sprint and run away
Click HERE for a video guide

steps.description: Open the Duskwood Chest. Loot it for Klaven Mortwake's Journal.

tips.text: Travel up to 2nd top floor of the tower. Whilst in Stealth and the Defias Tower Sentries aren't next to you, Jump onto the chair, then onto the lamp, then onto the bookshelf on top of the waypoint location
Manually Unstealth, then press your Interact with Target keybind to open the Duskwood Chest. Loot it for Klaven Mortwake's Journal
Your Stealth will temporarily stop working after looting Klaven Mortwake's Journal

Be prepared to run if you don't kill the Defias Tower Sentries on the 2nd floor. They will most likely aggro you permanently (but not attack you) when you are on top of the bookshelf as it is an evade spot

If you have a Dagger in your bags or equipped, you can cast Ambush on the Defias Tower Patrollers and Defias Tower Sentries inside to kill them instantly. Be prepared to run after you kill the first Defias Tower Sentry and remember you can be hit from above. This is slower, but a LOT safer
Be careful as the Malformed Defias Drone and Defias Drones can be at the entrance of the tower if you have to run out of it
Click HERE for a video guide

steps.description: Kill Dust Devils. Loot them for their Debris.

tips.text: Dust Devils can spawn throughout all of Westfall. Their spawn locations are marked on the map

steps.description: Click the Old Footlocker on the ground. Turn in The Legend of Stalvan and accept The Legend of Stalvan
Swim out to sea
Open the Strange Lockbox. Loot it for the Half Pendant of Aquatic Endurance
Cast Teleport: Moonglade
Use the Half Pendant of Aquatic Agility to combine it with the Half Pendant of Aquatic Endurance at the Shrine of Remulos
Cast Teleport: Moonglade.

tips.text: This will save you time from running back

steps.description: Talk to Dendrite Starblaze, turn in Trial of the Sea Lion, and accept Aquatic Form
Talk to Loganaar and train your class spells
Talk to Silva Fil'naveth and fly to Teldrassil
Talk to Mathrengyl Bearwalker and turn in Aquatic Form
Talk to Thor and fly to Stormwind
Hearth to Stormwind
Talk to Collin Mauren and turn in Devils in Westfall
Talk to Shaina Fuller. Level your First Aid to 80

tips.text: If you have a Paladin or Druid friend, ask them to remove the Touch of Zanzil for you instead

steps.description: Talk to Shaina Fuller. Train Anti-Venom.

tips.text: If you have a Paladin or Druid friend, ask them to remove the Touch of Zanzil for you instead

steps.description: Talk to Master Mathias Shaw and turn in Klaven's Tower.

tips.text: Remember to re-equip your main weapon if you switched to a Dagger earlier

steps.description: Talk to Dungar Longdrink and fly to Duskwood
Talk to Daphne Stilwell, turn in The Tome of Valor, accept The Tome of Valor, and turn in The Tome of Valor
Hearth to Darkshire
Talk to Thor and fly to Darkshire
Talk to Chef Grual and turn in Seasoned Wolf Kabobs.

tips.text: You need 50 skill in cooking to accept this quest

steps.description: Talk to Chef Grual, turn in Jitters' Growling Gut, and accept Dusky Crab Cakes
Talk to Chef Grual and turn in Dusky Crab Cakes
Talk to Commander Althea Ebonlocke, turn in The Night Watch, and accept The Night Watch
Talk to Clerk Daltry, turn in The Legend of Stalvan, and accept The Legend of Stalvan
Talk to Madame Eva, turn in Supplies from Darkshire, and accept Ghost Hair Thread
Talk to Viktori Prism'Antras and turn in Look To The Stars
Talk to Felicia Maline and fly to Redridge Mountains
Talk to Marshal Marris and accept Blackrock Menace
Talk to Foreman Oslow and accept Rethban Ore
Talk to Dockmaster Baren and accept Selling Fish and Murloc Poachers
Talk to Guard Berton and accept What Comes Around...
Talk to Martie Jainrose and accept An Unwelcome Guest
Kill Bellygrub. Loot him for his Tusk
Enter the Rethban Caverns
Kill Redridge Drudgers. Loot them for their Ore.

tips.text: Redridge Bashers also share spawns with Redridge Drudgers so you may need to kill them to make them spawn
Redridge Drudgers attack very fast and Redridge Bashers have a Knockdown stun
You may also acquire them by Mining the Copper Veins and Tin Veins inside the Rethban Caverns

steps.description: Kill Redridge Drudgers. Loot them for their Ore.

tips.text: Redridge Bashers also share spawns with Redridge Drudgers so you may need to kill them to make them spawn
Redridge Drudgers attack very fast and Redridge Bashers have a Knockdown stun

steps.description: Talk to Martie Jainrose and turn in An Unwelcome Guest
Kill Blackrock Grunts and Blackrock Outrunners. Loot them for their Axes.

tips.text: Be aware the Blackrock Outrunners will cast Net on you
Alternate between killing Orcs and the Murlocs marked on the map southwest

steps.description: Kill Murloc Scouts and Murloc Tidecallers. Loot them for their Fins and Sunfish
Talk to Marshal Marris and turn in Blackrock Menace
Talk to Dockmaster Baren and turn in Selling Fish
Talk to Dockmaster Baren and turn in Murloc Poachers
Click on The Wanted Poster and accept Wanted: Lieutenant Fangore
Talk to Bailiff Conacher and accept Solomon's Law
Talk to Ariena Stormfeather and fly to Duskwood
Talk to Herble Baubbletump. Buy a Bronze Tube. This is a limited supply item. Skip this step if Herble Baubbletump doesn't have one
Talk to Viktori Prism'Antras, accept Look To The Stars, and turn in Look To The Stars
Talk to Viktori Prism'Antras and accept Look To The Stars
Talk to Blind Mary, turn in Look To The Stars, and accept Look To The Stars
Kill the Insane Ghoul. Loot him for Mary's Looking Glass. The Insane Ghoul may be inside of the chapel or walking around outside

tips.text: The Insane Ghoul may be inside of the chapel or walking around outside

steps.description: Talk to Viktori Prism'Antras and turn in Look To The Stars
Talk to Blind Mary, turn in Ghost Hair Thread, and accept Return the Comb
Talk to Madame Eva, turn in Return the Comb, and accept Deliver the Thread
Talk to Councilman Millstipe and accept Crime and Punishment
Talk to Chef Grual and accept Return to Jitters
Click the Mound of loose dirt on the ground, turn in Sven's Revenge, and accept Sven's Camp
Talk to Jitters and turn in Return to Jitters
Talk to Bliztik upstairs. Buy as many Healing Potions that are available. This is a limited supply item. Skip this step if Bliztik doesn't have any
Talk to Abercrombie, turn in Deliver the Thread, and accept Zombie Juice
Talk to Sven Yorgen, turn in Sven's Camp, and accept The Shadowy Figure
Grind to level 25 plus 29845 experience
Travel to Goldshire
Talk to Innkeeper Farley, turn in The Legend of Stalvan, and accept The Legend of Stalvan
Go upstairs. Open the Storage Chest. Loot it for An Undelivered Letter
Travel to Northshire Abbey
Talk to Brother Paxton, turn in Rethban Ore, and accept Return to Kristoff.

tips.text: Brother Paxton is on the ground floor

steps.description: Travel to Stormwind City
Teleport to Stormwind City
Talk to Jennea and train your class spells
Talk to Collin Mauren and turn in Devils in Westfall
Talk to Kyra Boucher. Buy 2 Rune of Teleportations from her
Head to the Slaughtered Lamb and go downstairs
Talk to Zardeth of the Black Claw and accept A Noble Brew
Talk to Ursula Deline and train your class spells
Talk to Caretaker Folsom, turn in The Legend of Stalvan, and accept The Legend of Stalvan
Click the Sealed Crate on the ground and turn in The Legend of Stalvan
Talk to Sheldras Moontree and train your class spells
Talk to Brother Kristoff and turn in Return to Kristoff
Travel to the Stormwind Cathedral
Talk to Duthorian Rall and turn in The Tome of Valor
Talk to Arthur the Faithful and train your class spells
Talk to Brother Joshua and train your class spells
Talk to Brother Sarno and accept Tinkmaster Overspark.

tips.text: Skip this step if you are below level 26

steps.description: Talk to Einris Brightspear and train your class spells
Travel to the Stormwind Keep
Talk to Milton Sheaf and turn in An Old History Book.

tips.text: If you found An Old History Book you may turn it in

steps.description: Talk to Wu Shen or Ilsa Corbin and train your class spells
Talk to Osborne the Night Man and train your class spells
Talk to Nikova Raskol and accept The Color of Blood.

tips.text: Nikova Raskol patrols in Old Town

steps.description: Talk to Warden Thelwater and accept The Stockade Riots and Quell The Uprising
Talk to Warden Thelwater and accept Quell The Uprising
Find a group to The Stockades
Kill the Defias. Loot them for their Bandanas
Kill Targorr the Dread. Loot him for his Head. Kill Dextren Ward on the west prison wing. Loot him for his Hand.

tips.text: Targorr the Dread has a random spawn location

steps.description: Kill Bazil Thredd on the east prison wing. Loot him for his Head.

tips.text: Ensure you have 3 Silk Cloth for the follow up of this quest chain

steps.description: Talk to Warden Thelwater, turn in Quell The Uprising, turn in The Stockade Riots, and accept The Curious Visitor
Talk to Warden Thelwater and turn in Quell The Uprising
Talk to Baros Alexston, turn in The Curious Visitor, and accept Shadow of the Past
Talk to Nikova Raskol and turn in The Color of Blood. Nikova Raskol patrols in Old Town

tips.text: Nikova Raskol patrols in Old Town

steps.description: Enter the SI:7 Headquarters. Travel up stairs toward Master Mathias Shaw
Talk to Master Mathias Shaw, turn in Shadow of the Past, and accept Look to an Old Friend
Talk to Elling Trias up stairs and turn in Look to an Old Friend
Talk to Newton Burnside. Withdraw the following items from your bank: Glyph of Azora
Talk to Dungar Longdrink and fly to Darkshire
Talk to Herble Baubbletump. Buy a Bronze Tube. This is a limited supply item. Skip this step if Herble Baubbletump doesn't have one
Talk to Viktori Prism'Antras, accept Look To The Stars, and turn in Look To The Stars
Talk to Viktori Prism'Antras and accept Look To The Stars
Talk to Blind Mary, turn in Look To The Stars, and accept Look To The Stars
Kill the Insane Ghoul. Loot him for Mary's Looking Glass.

tips.text: The Insane Ghoul may be inside of the chapel or walking around outside

steps.description: Talk to Viktori Prism'Antras and turn in Look To The Stars
Talk to Madame Eva, turn in The Shadowy Figure, and accept The Shadowy Search Continues
Talk to Clerk Daltry, turn in The Shadowy Search Continues, and accept Inquire at the Inn
Talk to Councilman Millstipe and turn in Crime and Punishment
Talk to Tavernkeep Smitts, turn in Zombie Juice, accept Gather Rot Blossoms, turn in Inquire at the Inn, and accept Finding the Shadowy Figure
Talk to Innkeeper Trelayne. Set your Hearthstone to Duskwood
Travel to Raven Hill Cemetery
Kill Skeletal Fiends and Skeletal Horrors. Loot them for their Rot Blossoms
Talk to Jitters, turn in Finding the Shadowy Figure, and accept Return to Sven
Talk to Sven Yorgen and turn in Return to Sven
Talk to Sven Yorgen and accept Proving Your Worth
Kill Skeletal Raiders, Skeletal Healers and Skeletal Warders.

tips.text: Enter the Dawning Wood Catacombs for the Skeletal Warders
Mor'Ladim a level 35 Elite patrols around the cemetery. Be cautious of him

steps.description: Talk to Sven Yorgen, turn in Proving Your Worth, and accept Seeking Wisdom
Grind until your Hearthstone is off cooldown. Hearth to Darkshire
Hearth to Darkshire
Talk to Tavernkeep Smitts and turn in Gather Rot Blossoms
Talk to Commander Althea Ebonlocke and turn in The Night Watch
Talk to Felicia Maline and fly to Redridge Mountains
Talk to Guard Howe and accept Blackrock Bounty
Talk to Marshal Marris and accept Tharil'zun and Shadow Magic
Talk to Verner Osgood and accept Howling in the Hills
Click on The Wanted Poster and accept Wanted: Gath'Ilzogg
Talk to Guard Berton and turn in What Comes Around...
Talk to Martie Jainrose and accept An Unwelcome Guest
Kill Bellygrub. Loot him for his Tusk
Talk to Martie Jainrose and turn in An Unwelcome Guest
Kill Yowler. Loot him for his Paw.

tips.text: Split pull him using Blizzard or Flamestrike

steps.description: Kill Yowler. Loot him for his Paw
Kill Lieutenant Fangore. Loot him for his Paw. Lieutenant Fangore will engage with 2 additional Gnolls. Skip this step if you aren't confident.

tips.text: Lieutenant Fangore is immune to Shadow damage. Ensure you have party members that can help, otherwise you may skip this step
Lieutenant Fangore is immune to Shadow damage. Ensure you have party members that can help, otherwise you may skip this step

steps.description: Kill Lieutenant Fangore. Loot him for his Paw.

tips.text: Lieutenant Fangore will engage with 2 additional Gnolls. Skip this step if you aren't confident

steps.description: Kill the Shadowhides. Loot them for their Pendants
Click the Old Lion Statue and turn in A Watchful Eye
Click the Old Lion Statue and accept Looking Further
Click An Empty Jar on the barrel at the top of Stonewatch Tower and turn in Looking Further.

tips.text: Don't accept the follow up

steps.description: Kill Tharil'zun. Loot him for his Head
Enter Stonewatch Keep. Kill Gath'Ilzogg. Loot him for his Head
Kill Blackrock Shadowcasters. Loot them for their Orbs
Enter Render's Rock
Kill Blackrock Champions
Talk to Corporal Keeshan in the back of Render's Rock and accept Missing In Action
Escort Corporal Keeshan back to Lakeshire.

tips.text: Be careful to not pull too many mobs right after you leave the cave

steps.description: Talk to Marshal Marris and turn in Missing In Action
Talk to Marshal Marris and turn in Tharil'zun
Talk to Marshal Marris and turn in Shadow Magic
Talk to Magistrate Solomon and turn in Wanted: Gath'Ilzogg
Talk to Verner Osgood and turn in Howling in the Hills
Talk to Magistrate Solomon and turn in Wanted: Lieutenant Fangore
Talk to Bailiff Conacher and turn in Solomon's Law
Talk to Guard Howe and turn in Blackrock Bounty
Teleport to Stormwind City
Talk to Ariena Stormfeather and fly to Stormwind
